thread.title: Healthy foods to eat for breakfast
thread.title_full: Healthy foods to eat for breakfast - Business Insider

author: Sarah Schmalbruch
title: Healthy foods to eat for breakfast

organizations.name: bi graphics infographic food breakfast health nutrition fitness eating

text:
baibaz / Shutterstock
Eating a healthy breakfast packed with nutrients sets you up for a good day.
But it's not uncommon to wake up hungry, and craving something that's not good for you — like a doughnut or a bagel.
Luckily, there are plenty of healthy breakfast foods you can swap out for the unhealthy ones. You'll get a similar taste, but much more nutritional value.
Keep scrolling to see some suggestions.
View As: One Page Slides Rye bread has complex carbs that keep you full longer. Diana Yukari / INSIDER Plain yogurt has a lot less sugar than flavored yogurt. Diana Yukari / INSIDER Whole wheat pancakes are packed with fiber. Diana Yukari / INSIDER Avocados provide healthier fat than bacon does. Diana Yukari / INSIDER A smoothie will keep you fuller for a lot longer than juice will. Diana Yukari / INSIDER Steel cut oats are a great way to start the day.
